code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Library=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/videos').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setVideos(data)).catch(err=>console.error('Error fetching videos:',err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Video Library"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Most recent uploads appear first."}),videos.map(vid=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-table-container",style:{display:'flex',gap:'20px',marginBottom:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:vid.name}),vid.isVideo?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("video",{controls:true,width:"400",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:vid.path,type:"video/mp4"}),"Your browser does not support the video tag."]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:vid.path,alt:vid.name,width:"400"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"plays-table",style:{alignSelf:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Play"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Probability"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Play 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"25%"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Play 2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"20%"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Play 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"15%"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Play 4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"10%"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Play 5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"5%"})]})]})]})]},vid.id))]});};export default Library;
